ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not(ISCHANGED( GGP_Number__c )),$Profile.Id != '00e30000001YLF7',(or( RecordType.Name='VOC' , RecordType.Name='VOC Read Only' )), (or(Service_Support_Customer_Expectations__c = '', Service_Support_Summary__c='')) , (or(text( Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c) ='Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied' , text( Service_Support_Customer_Rating__c) = 'Red - Very Dissatisfied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check that Service/Support Customer Expectations and Service/Support Summary fields are filled.
